channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Smart Rings, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: A svelte smart ring can track important health metrics and doesn’t need to be charged every day.

item.title: Google Chrome adds AI-powered store summaries to help US shoppers
item.description: The feature will display a pop-up that informs consumers about the store's reputation for things like product quality, shopping, pricing, customer ser...

item.title: What Is MicroSD Express? Everything You Need to Know
item.description: What is the latest MicroSD iteration, and why does your Nintendo Switch need it?

item.title: Programmers Aren’t So Humble Anymore—Maybe Because Nobody Codes in Perl
item.description: Perl is a messy, maddening programming language, the “duct tape of the internet.” But at least you can tell it was made by humans.

item.title: Tesla signs $16.5B deal with Samsung to make AI chips
item.description: The deal for next-generation chips is a boon for Samsung.

item.title: 20 national security experts urge Trump administration to restrict Nvidia H20 sales to China
item.description: The letter states that allowing sales of the H20 AI chip to China could hurt the U.S.'s AI "edge" and worsen chip bottlenecks in the U.S.

item.title: Is Silicon Valley Losing Its Influence on DC?
item.description: This episode of Uncanny Valley covers black holes, woke AI, and the relationship between Silicon Valley billionaires and the Trump Administration.

item.title: Nothing Headphone (1) Review: Something Special
item.description: These noise-canceling headphones are very nearly as good as AirPods Max, and they cost $150 less.

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: Tesla vs GM: A tale of two earnings
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility, your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.

item.title: Do startups still need Silicon Valley? Hear from the founders and funders challenging old assumptions at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, Oct 27-29, will dive into whether building in Silicon Valley still gives founders an edge. Register now to save up to $625.
